title: American Solution for Simplifying the Estate Tax Act of 2014
content: American Solution for Simplifying the Estate Tax Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue to: (1)nbsp. Allow taxpayers an election to make annual payments of 1 of their adjusted gross income for a minimum seven-year period in lieu of existing estate and generation-skipping transfer taxes, and (2) allow a step-up in basis for estate property of a taxpayer making an election under this Act. nbsp. Sets forth requirements for the filing of an estate tax return for taxpayers who have made an election under this Act.
